BULLETED LISTS
Trend Insight
Demand for healthier snacking options is increasing.
column5: Launch of low-oil, baked, or millet namkeen variants.

column3: Consumers are conscious of food sourcing and packaging.
column4: Plant-based snacks and compostable packaging rise.
column5: Eco-friendly packaging and sustainability labels gain importance.

column3: Surge in online grocery platforms and Q-commerce.
column5: Namkeen brands should optimize for e-commerce and rapid delivery models.

column3: Willingness to pay more for exotic, high-quality snacks.
column4: Rise in gourmet and fusion snack categories.
column5: Premiumize existing products with better packaging and fusion flavors.

column3: Preference for culturally authentic and nostalgic snack experiences.
column4: Resurgence in traditional Indian namkeens by region.
column5: Emphasize local branding (e.g., Rajasthani Bhujia, Bengali Chanachur).
